dcterms:description: CARLA is an open-source simulator for automated driving that supports different environments and commonly used sensors in automated driving. It can generate matching labels for the sensor data, including bounding boxes, semantic segmentation maps, depth maps, and even pedestriansâ€™ skeletons.
dcterms:title: CARLA Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Caesar
dcterms:description: nuScenes is a dataset for automated driving collected in Boston and Singapore under different environmental conditions. It contains data from the entire sensor suite of an automated vehicle, including camera, lidar, radar, and localization data, with labeled 3D bounding boxes and object class labels.
dcterms:title: nuScenes Dataset
